## About the Program
As a mechanical engineer, the devices you design are critical to our modern economy and future innovation. A master’s degree can help you learn advanced engineering methods and give you research opportunities.
We've developed a research-intensive curriculum, with unique hands-on experiences and mentorship from our faculty. As you earn your degree, you'll have the option of choosing a path with or without a thesis. With a thesis, you’ll take more mathematics courses, which can be beneficial if you want to pursue a doctoral degree. If you'd rather do a research or design project, you can do so with an emphasis in research/design or technology/engineering management. No matter what you choose, you will have an opportunity to explore a number of research areas.
### Concentrations
- Engineering Management Emphasis
- Research Design

# Graduate Program
![Students at working in front of School of Engineering sign.](https://www.uab.edu/engineering/mme/images/images/graduate/students-at-MPAD.jpg)The Department of Mechanical and Materials Engineering at UAB offers a variety of opportunities to conduct cutting-edge research in the fields of mechanical engineering as well as in a variety of materials science interests, such as metals and alloys, polymers and composites, biomaterials and healthcare materials and devices, ceramics and glass, and nanomaterials for a wide array of applications. The MME Department offers:
- [The fast-track Master's in Materials Engineering](https://www.uab.edu/engineering/mme/undergraduate/5th-year-program)
- [The fast-track Master's in Mechanical Engineering](https://www.uab.edu/engineering/mme/graduate/5th-year-mechanical)
- [The Master of Science in Materials Engineering](https://www.uab.edu/engineering/mme/graduate/ms-materials)
- [The Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering](https://www.uab.edu/engineering/mme/graduate/ms-mechanical)
- [The Ph.D. program in Materials Engineering](https://www.uab.edu/engineering/mme/graduate/phd-program)
- [The Tri-campus Materials Science Ph.D. program](https://www.uab.edu/engineering/mme/graduate/tri-campus-phd-program)
- [The Ph.D. program in Mechanical Engineering](https://www.uab.edu/engineering/mme/graduate/phd-mechanical-engineering)
Research Assistantships, UAB scholarships, and fellowships are generally available for those pursuing graduate study. Contact Materials Graduate Program Director Dr. Vinoy Thomas at [vthomas@uab.edu](mailto:vthomas@uab.edu) or Mechanical Graduate Program Director David Littlefield at [littlefield@uab.edu](mailto:littlefield@uab.edu) for details. You are encouraged to communicate with the individual faculty member for the research opportunities.
In addition to the programs listed above, UAB also offers a [Master of Engineering degree with a concentration in Advanced Safety and Engineering Management](https://www.uab.edu/asem). This fully online program is designed for working, full-time professionals. Courses have synchronous and asynchronous components, but there are no on-campus requirements. [Learn more](https://www.uab.edu/engineering/asem/).
